summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Lakeview Avenue, in the City of Seattle, from the north line of East Park Addition to the City of Seattle, to East Newton Street, by constructing concrete or wooden sidewalks, together with all necessary crosswalks and appurtenances, in accordance with Resolution No. 1287 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
